45 class Vibrator
46 {
47 public:
48  Vibrator(const Thermodynamics::HarmonicOscillator&, const MillikanWhiteModel&);
49 
51  size_t speciesIndex() const {
52  return m_relaxation_model.speciesIndex();
53  }
54 
56  double molecularWeight() const {
57  return m_relaxation_model.molecularWeight();
58  }
59 
61  double energy(double T) const {
62  return m_energy_model.energy(T);
63  }
64 
68  double relaxationTime(const class Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo) const {
69  return m_relaxation_model.relaxationTime(thermo);
70  }
71 
72 private:
73  Thermodynamics::HarmonicOscillator m_energy_model;
74  MillikanWhiteModel m_relaxation_model;
75 };

78 Vibrator::Vibrator(
79  const Thermodynamics::HarmonicOscillator& ho, const MillikanWhiteModel& mw
80 ) : m_energy_model(ho), m_relaxation_model(mw) { }

89 class OmegaVT : public TransferModel
90 {
91 public:
92  OmegaVT(Mixture&);
93  virtual ~OmegaVT() = default;
94  virtual double source() override;
95 private:
96  std::vector<Vibrator> m_vibrators;
97 };
98 
99 
100 // Register the transfer model
101 Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<OmegaVT, TransferModel> omegaVT("OmegaVT");
102 
103 
104 OmegaVT::OmegaVT(Mixture& mix) :
105  TransferModel(mix)
106 {
107  Thermodynamics::HarmonicOscillatorDB hodb;
108  MillikanWhiteModelDB mwdb(mix);
109 
110  for (const auto& species: mix.species())
111  {
112  if (species.type() == Thermodynamics::MOLECULE)
113  {
114  auto ho = hodb.create(species.name());
115  auto mw = mwdb.create(species.name(), ho.characteristicTemperatures()[0]);
116  m_vibrators.emplace_back(ho, mw);
117  }
118  }
119 }
120 
121 
122 double OmegaVT::source()
123 {
124  auto Y = mixture().Y();
125  auto T = mixture().T();
126  auto Tv = mixture().Tv();
127 
128  double src = 0.0;
129 
130  for (auto& vibrator: m_vibrators)
131  {
132  const auto iv = vibrator.speciesIndex();
133  const auto tau = vibrator.relaxationTime(mixture());
134  const auto mw = vibrator.molecularWeight();
135  src += Y[iv]*(vibrator.energy(T) - vibrator.energy(Tv))/(mw*tau);
136  }
137 
138  return src * mixture().density() * RU;
139 }

172 
173 // /**
174 // * Computes the source terms of the Vibration-Translational energy transfer in \f$ [J/(m^3\cdot s)] \f$
175 // * using a Landau-Teller formula taking into account Park's correction (default; can be disabled by making zero the appropriate flag, see below):
176 // * \f[ \Omega^{VT}_m = \rho_m \frac{e^V_m\left(T\right)-e^V_m\left(T_{vm}\right)} {\tau^{VT}_m} \f]
177 // *
178 // * The average relaxation time \f$ \tau^{VT}_m \f$ is given by the expression:
179 // *
180 // * \f[ \tau^{VT}_m = \frac{ \sum_{j \in \mathcal{H}} \rho_j / M_j}{ \sum_{j \in \mathcal{H}} \rho_j / (M_j \tau^{VT}_{mj}) } \f]
181 // *
182 // * More information about the above model can be found in @cite Panesi 2008
183 // *
184 // * @todo compare the average relaxation time with the one suggested by Park93
185 // *
186 // */
187

189 // {
190 // const double * p_Y = m_mixture.Y();
191 // double rho = m_mixture.density();
192 // double T = m_mixture.T();
193 // double Tv = m_mixture.Tv();
194 
195 // m_mixture.speciesHOverRT(T, T, T, T, T, NULL, NULL, NULL, mp_hveq, NULL, NULL);
196 // m_mixture.speciesHOverRT(T, Tv, T, Tv, Tv, NULL, NULL, NULL, mp_hv, NULL, NULL);
197
